text: @Scavino45 @POTUS @realDonaldTrump Mr. President, I’ve been a fan since “the apprentice”. I’m a dentist for 10 plus years, single mom out of a job because of COVID-19 & haven’t received unemployment or business loan yet. Please help!!!
